name: Dying Byte Survival (itch)
description:
A corporation of Dying Byte and Jana Games Studio that will release somewhere in first quarter of 2021.

Its a Tactical, FPS, Survival, Bullet Time, Open World, Gun-Fu, 3D, Shooter based on tactics and speed in a open world map. The game is set in 2036 players will be able to kill enemies that want kill you to take to you secret and rule the world by making war and mind control. The idea came from F.E.A.R at 2006 and the game will be almost same as F.E.A.R with new technology and a open world map.

The game offers a variety of weapons, Slow motion effect, very detailed particle and effect system, a closed quarters but also open fields, open world experience, to explore and make missions to buy weapons and districts. You loose you gun when dying but the game offers lots of opportunities like selling Guns, Shards/Tech Artifacts and Weapon Attachments. It will feature 2 additional game modes: Classic Horde Waves Survival and the Unlimited Endless Auto Generated Stage. It has deep animation development, it will constantly have updates for adding weapons, districts and fixing bugs as well as a story line and DLCs.

In the future of development we will add more Guns,  New missions, Expand the map from 4 districts to 16, add more rooms for the Unlimited Endless Auto Generated Stage about to 100 rooms and an Online Multiplayer in style of Counter Strike with different missions in every round, as well as a Deathmatch and Team Deathmatch with respawn and a mini Last Man Standing at the final stages.

This game is especial made for Streamers, Youtubers and Film makers and they can show of First Person Gun-Fu skills and make awsome videos and will be released as Early access (Beta) for the first time in 2021. Its a special game for special players. 

THIS IS NOT THE FINAL PRODUCT. EVERYTHING IS ABOUT TO CHANGE.

THIS IS JUST A TEST STAGE. THE OFFICIAL STAGE ARE DISCRIBED ON THE IMAGES ON THE ITCH PAGE.

SUBSCRIBE TO THE CHANNEL TO GET NEWS, DEVLOGS AND FOR ANNOUNCING THE RELEASE OF THE FREE PLAYABLE DEMO!
WE THANK ALL SUPPORTERS THAT SUPPORT OUR WAY TO THIS AWSOME EXPERIENCE!
